domain.name: Politician
domain.description: Politicians in the world, like Joe Biden

text:
Trump attempted to muzzle public health experts. Repeatedly said coronavirus was "under control." Refused for a long time to wear a mask to ensure people took this threat seriously.

At a time when Americans are depending on competent leadership, Trump has failed again and again.
